zscore_method: smooth using a zero phase linear digital filter , downsample to ~10 Hz using a moving window mean, fit 405 signal to 470 signal using least-squares regression to calculate fitted control signal, calculate dff using ((470 signal - fitted control signal) / fitted control signal), fit and subtract an exponential to the dff signal to remove baseline drift not captured in the 405 fit, zscore this subracted signal using ((dff- mean(dff)) / std(dff))
